content: Hi all, on the subscriptions backport IG, there was a note from FMG that I need to add a category - but I haven't had any luck in figuring out what/where that is. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
same as category for Bulk data, as listed on http://fhir.org/guides/registry/, it's "EHR Access"
Thanks @Lynn Laakso, but where would I go about setting that?
Thanks Jean! I could have sworn I searched there already, but there it is. Cheers!
